name: BakingRadio
description:
You bake and you listen to the radio.

CONTROL:

  • MOUSE CLICK to ADD FRUIT & ADJUST ANTENNA
  • SPECIAL COMMAND [A - S - D]:
  • ORANGE BUTTON - HIT [A] ONE TIME
  • RED BUTTON - HIT [S] THREE TIMES CONSECUTIVELY
  • PURPLE BUTTON - PRESS [D] until button CLEARED

Note*

Music:  Deep_Blue_Sea_Blues 

Reminders:

Assets except the music, sound effect and fruit 3D models are created by ROK1006.

Developed by ROK1006.

FOLLOW Instagram Account @r_ok_ot for more of my other works and currently developing games.

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING.
